description: A Tynwald Auditor General office will be set up to make sure departments offer value for money.
title: Tynwald approves Auditor General for stronger scrutiny of public spending
title_page: Tynwald approves Auditor General for stronger scrutiny of public spending - BBC News
maintext: The Auditor General Act, which allows for the creation of the scrutiny office, was passed into law in 2011 but is still yet to be brought into effect as the relevant steps to bring it into force were not taken by the Council of Ministers.
